titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, International Division FA1693

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:06:27 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections primarily by program, office, field office or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: International Division files include, but are not limited to, the following programs and offices: International Affairs Program, Asia and Pacific, Developing Countries Program, European and International Affairs Program, Latin America and the Caribbean, Middle East and Africa, Population Program, South and Southeast Asia, and Program Area One files.
